text.section:
The governing body of Cecil County and of a municipal corporation in Cecil County shall grant a property tax credit under this section against the county and municipal corporation property tax imposed on:
property that is owned by the Society for the Preservation of Maryland Antiquities, Incorporated; and
property that is owned by the Friends of the Library of Cecil County, Maryland, Incorporated.

The governing body of Cecil County or of a municipal corporation in Cecil County may grant, by law, a property tax credit under this section against the county or municipal corporation property tax imposed on:
property that is owned by the Upper Chesapeake Watershed Association and is used:
to assist in the preservation of a wild nature area;
to establish a nature reserve or other protected area; or
generally to promote conservation;
property that is owned by an incorporated, nonprofit fire company or rescue squad, if the property:
is leased for more than 60 days during any 12-month period under a contractual agreement for the operation of the fire company's fire hall; and
would qualify for the exemption under § 7-209 of this article if leased for not more than 60 days during any 12-month period; and
property that:
is owned by:
is actually used exclusively for the purposes of a little league organization of Cecil County.

section.section:
The governing body of a municipal corporation in Cecil County may grant, by law, a property tax credit under this section against the municipal corporation property tax imposed on residential real property that is:
owned by an individual serving as a member of a volunteer fire company as defined under § 3-1101 of the Courts and Judicial Proceedings Article;
occupied as the principal residence of an individual serving as a member of a volunteer fire company as defined under § 3-1101 of the Courts and Judicial Proceedings Article; and
located within the jurisdiction of the municipal corporation.

The municipal corporation may provide, by law, for:
the amount of a property tax credit under this subsection;
the duration of a property tax credit under this subsection; and
any other provision necessary to carry out this subsection.
